description: Effective participation and individual presentations in three of four problem-based learning (PBL) classes. Includes group discussions, presentations (5 minutes each with 1-page handout), and self-directed learning components.
2-hour individual test with multiple choice questions and short answers covering the Endocrine component of the course. Includes practice materials and feedback.
2000-word individual written report based on an endocrinology case study. Requires research, scientific communication, and self-directed learning to address knowledge gaps.

2-hour individual exam during UNSW exam period with multiple choice questions and short answers assessing Reproduction, Fetal, and Developmental Physiology components. Includes practice materials and feedback.
